section.name: WOLips
section.p: download install wizards popup manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

subsection.name: Mac
subsection.p: Right click on Eclipse.app. Select show package contents. Navigate to Contens/Resources/Java"

subsection.name: common
subsection.p: Expand your download. You should now have a folder named com.objectstyle.woproject.wolips-1.0b. The version may differ.
Move the folder in the plugin folder.
